value: 無効な期間が過ぎました。 line_item.date_fromはline_item.date_toの前にある必要があります
reference value: Invalid term period passed. line_item.date_from must be before line_item.date_to
description: Invalid term period passed. line_item.date_from must be before line_item.date_to

value: Xero統合は、メンテナンスのため一時的に無効になっています。これは数分で終了するはずです。しばらくしてからお試しください。
reference value: Xero integration is temporarily disabled for maintenance. This should be over in few minutes. Please try after sometime.
description: Xero integration is temporarily disabled for maintenance. This should be over in few minutes. Please try after sometime.

value: 請求額{0}はゼロより大きくする必要があります
reference value: Invoice Amount {0} should be greater than zero
description: Invoice Amount {0} should be greater than zero

value: 返金するカード支払いの上限を超えました
reference value: Exceeded maximum limit of card payments to refund
description: Exceeded maximum limit of card payments to refund

value: 定期的なアドオンを保留中の請求書に追加することはできません。
reference value: Recurring addon cannot be added to pending invoice.
description: Recurring addon cannot be added to pending invoice.

value: 申し訳ありませんが、リクエストを処理できません。販売者/販売者に連絡してください。
reference value: Sorry, we are unable process your request. Please get in touch with the seller/merchant.
description: Sorry, we are unable process your request. Please get in touch with the seller/merchant.

value: 指定された量が許容限度「{0}」を超えています
reference value: Specified amount is greater than the allowed limit ''{0}''
description: The refund amount is greater than the invoice amount

value: Xero統合はサイトで無効になっています。詳細とサポートについては、support @ chargebee.comにお問い合わせください。
reference value: Xero integration is disabled for your site. Please contact support@chargebee.com for further details and assistance.
description: Xero integration is disabled for your site. Please contact support@chargebee.com for further details and assistance.

value: このトランザクションに使用された支払い方法がクリアされているため、リクエストを処理できません。
reference value: Cannot process request as the payment method used for this transaction has been cleared.
description: Cannot process request as the payment method used for this transaction has been cleared.

value: 返金には異なるカード決済が必要なため、操作を進めることができません
reference value: Operation cannot be proceed since customers different card payments are required to refund
description: Operation cannot be proceed since customers different card payments are required to refund

value: すべての広告申込情報は同じ価格タイプ（税込み/税込み）である必要があります。
reference value: All lineitem should of same price type(Tax Exclusive/ Tax Inclusive).
description: All lineitem should of same price type(Tax Exclusive/ Tax Inclusive).

value: 参照された請求明細{0}は請求書{1}に添付されていません
reference value: The referenced charge line item {0} is not attached to invoice {1}
description: The referenced charge line item {0} is not attached to invoice {1}

value: 払い戻し操作に失敗しました。エラーメッセージ：{0}
同じ請求書を使用して、デジタル製品と非デジタル製品の両方に請求することはできません。
reference value: You cannot bill both digital and non-digital products using the same invoice.
description: You cannot bill both digital and non-digital products using the same invoice.

value: 適用税が変わるため、住所は変更できません
reference value: Address cannot be changed as it changes the applied tax
description: Address cannot be changed as it changes the applied tax
